body.name: YOTSUBA Kitchen Knife Set, Chef Knife Set, Sharp High Carbon Stainless Steel Forged Blade Kitchen Knives Set with Ergonomic Rosewood Handle, Natural Wood
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 33 mins
features: PROFESSIONAL KITCHEN KNIFE SET - 1x Chef's knife, 1x Santoku knife, 1x Utility knife. This Yotsuba Milano series pro-grade cutlery set can easily handle all your kitchen tasks like chopping, slicing, dicing, mincing of meat, fruits and vegetables. These professional knives set will be your dependable companion, easy cooking effortless.

GERMAN STEEL - Milano series kitchen knife set is made of high-carbon stainless steel which has the highest mechanical performance and the best cutting performance. 15% chrome is also included in the blade's metal composition, which provides corrosion resistance and an anti-tarnish finish.

ULTRA SHARP EDGE - These chef knife set are forged from 5Cr15Mov German steel, the carbon content is 0.5%, chef knife make the hardness to 56±2 Rockwell. With carefully sharpening by our professional craftsmen, the blade edge reached 14 degrees per side. The combination of maximum sharpness and edge retention ensures precise and effortless cutting every time.

ERGONOMICALLY WOOD HANDLE - These kitchen knives sets features an ergonomic rosewood handle that provides a comfortable, non-slip grip. The handle's natural wood grain makes each knife unique, while the metal frame design and colored nail ensure good stability and balance.

YOTSUBA SERVICE - YOTSUBA knife sets for kitchen is easy and fast to clean. Perfect gift for Valentine's Day, Wedding, Birthday, Housewarming, Thanksgiving, Halloween, Christmas. We commit to provide high-quality knives that inspire your cutting and cooking passion. We offer a 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK policy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Main features and benefits of Yotsuba kitchen knives set

YOTSUBA Professional Chef Knife Set Ultra sharp edge The razor-sharp edge is engineered with a 56+ Rockwell hardness score and the edge was polished to 14-16 degrees per side. Anti-Rusting Premium German stainless steel ensures the exceptional anti-rust performance of our knife. Ergonomic Handle The handle of this knife is made from natural rosewood, not synthetic wood. The natural wood grain of the handle ensures that each knife is unique，adding a touch of individuality to your kitchen. Perfect gift The Yotsuba Milano Series chef knife comes with a premium gift box, making it the perfect gift for any home chef. With its exceptional cutting ability, preparing food becomes effortless and enjoyable. Care & caution Do not use on joints, bones, tough frozen meat;Do not use your hand to test the hardness of the blade;Clean and keep the knife dry after use;Keep the knife out of the reach of children;Hand washing is recommended, do not recommend long-term use of a dishwasher for cleaning. YOTSUBA’s promise At Yotsuba, we are committed to building long-term partnerships with both professional chefs and home cooks. We stand behind our products and offer a lifetime of support to ensure that you always have access to high-quality tools that meet your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: High quality, cuts like a razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sharp and beautiful knives

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very well made knife for the price. The entire edge cuts like a razor and made carving a ham effortless. I am very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is NOT Damascus steel (It seems to be a laser engraved pattern, which is misleading)
reviews.reviewText: The visible damask pattern is PURELY DECORATIVE and is probably applied by laser. These are NOT Damascus knives. This unnecessary pattern is annoying and misleading.This is a good knife for the price. I will update this review after a few months of usage. So far the sharpness is really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels Very Comfortable in my Hand
reviews.reviewText: Cuts beautifully! Replaced the large KitchenAid brand that came in that “Block” of knives set (red color) that a friend bought for me as a gift several years back. I never noticed anything amazing with the KitchenAid upon first use as I DID with THIS KNIFE. WOW, what a difference…❤️❤️❤️!! I also splurged and had bought the smaller matching pairing knife at the same time and so glad I did! Very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Sharp, High Quality
reviews.reviewText: For the price I was very surprised by the quality of these. For the only 3 knives you'd need in your kitchen, you get some really nice knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are not heavy, very sharp, and nice looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: Gutes und scharfes Messer für alltägliche Arbeiten
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Zunächst einmal habe ich das Messer im Zuge eine Produktbewertung getestet und bin daher sehr kritisch, was die Verarbeitung und die Schärfe angeht. Das Messer war sorgfältig und sicher verpackt, so dass dieses sicher und ohne Beschädigung bei einem ankommt. Nach dem Auspacken war ich von der Optik und dem Design recht erstaunt.Es liegt gut in der Hand, sieht schön aus und fühlt sich auch sehr scharf an. Es ist tatsächlich gut ausbalanciert zwischen Griff und Klinge, wie das bei anderen Größen aussieht kann ich nicht beurteilen. Das Damastmuster ist sicherlich nur per Laser aufgebracht, dies störte mich jedoch nicht weiter.Die Klinge fühlt sich angenehm leicht an, zur Härte kann ich nichts sagen.Ich habe die Klinge nach erster Verwendung leicht nachgeschliffen, jetzt ist es scharf wie eine Rasierklinge.Wie oft die Klinge nachgeschliffen werden muss, wird sich im Laufe der Zeit zeigen.Ich bin mit dem Messer jedoch sehr zufrieden, und von dem Preis überzeugt.Verschenken kann man es natürlich, allerdings ist es dafür fast zu schade.
Sie sind alle sehr schön und gute Qualität. Holz Textur darauf sieht auch sehr natürlich aus. Sie sind auch alle sehr scharf. Sehr robust mit schöner Gestaltung.
Qualität vom Äußeren her sehr gut. Habe das Messer verschenkt. Ist gut angekommen. Ob es sich im Alltag bewehrt, kann ich nicht sagen.

Das Messer scheint aus sehr gutem Stahl zu sein und ist sehr scharf. Es ist bequem, Gemüse und Fleisch zu schneiden, und es liegt gut in der Hand, ohne dass man sich die Hände reibt. Obwohl der Preis etwas hoch ist, denke ich, dass die Qualität seinen Preis wert ist.
gute Qualität und scharf im Gebrauch. mochten sie und waren sehr zu empfehlen
